**Procurement Overview**
------------------------

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to deliver a canine program at the Nova Institution for women. The program aims to provide vocational training to inmates, assisting in the reduction of risk and enhancing public safety.

**Statement of Work**
--------------------

The contractor must implement a canine program with the following components:

• Deliver classroom instruction, demonstrations, and hands-on practice in animal husbandry and history of dogs.
• Provide direct client delivery services for 5 hours per day, 250 days per year.
• Conduct interim program performance assessments and final evaluation reports for program participants.
• Share and discuss reports with participants throughout the program.
• Provide ongoing program development services and ensure program materials are current.

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

The following documents are required for tender submission:

• Solicitation Document and associated documents
• End of Period Report (final evaluation report)
• Interim Program Performance Assessment Report

**Bid Submission**
-----------------

Interested suppliers may submit a bid in either English or French. The closing date for bids is 2024-04-05T13:00:00. The evaluation process will be based on the criteria specified in the solicitation document.
